description: This file defines a singleton class AppDatabase that manages SQLite database connections for the notes frontend application. It handles database initialization, creation, and upgrades, providing a global database instance.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Singleton class managing the application's database connection, ensuring a single shared instance and lazy initialization.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that asynchronously returns the singleton database instance, opening and initializing the database if not already available.
